00046 namespace RTT {
00047     using namespace detail;

00049     PropertyBase::~PropertyBase()
00050     {}
00051 
00052     PropertyBase::PropertyBase()
00053     {}
00054 
00055     PropertyBase::PropertyBase( std::string name, std::string description)
00056         : _name(name), _description(description)
00057     {}
00058 
00059     void PropertyBase::setName(const std::string& name)
00060     {
00061         _name = name;
00062     }
00063 
00064     void PropertyBase::setDescription(const std::string& desc)
00065     {
00066         _description = desc;
00067     }

00069     namespace base {
00070         std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &os, PropertyBase* p)
00071         {
00072             if ( p )
00073                 os << p->getDataSource();
00074             else
00075                 os << "(null property)";
00076             return os;
00077         }
00078     }
00079 
00080     bool PropertyBase::compose( const PropertyBag& source)
00081     {
00082         DataSourceBase::shared_ptr dsb = getDataSource();
00083         ConstReferenceDataSource<PropertyBag> rds(source);
00084         rds.ref();
00085         if (dsb)
00086             return dsb->getTypeInfo()->composeType( &rds, dsb);
00087         return false;
00088     }
00089 }
